trait.name: Fated
trait.desc: Hover one Fated unit over another to form a pair and unlock a Fated Bonus. Your pair gains 20% HP.

stats.5: All Fated champions get 200% of the Fated Bonus
stats.7: All Fated champions get 300% of the Fated Bonus
stats.10: All Fated champions gain 300% of EVERY Fated Bonus

champions.name: Ahri
champions.skill_desc:
Deal magic damage to the current target and magic damage to adjacent enemies.

Fated Bonus: Gain 27 AP.

champions.name: Aphelios
champions.skill_desc:
20% Sunder the nearest 3 enemies for 7 seconds. Then fire 3 shots at them, dealing physical damage each.

Fated Bonus: Gain 25% Attack Damage.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

champions.name: Kindred
champions.skill_desc:
Dash away from the current target and deal magic damage to them and magic damage to the nearst enemy.

Fated Bonus: Gain 18% Attack Speed.

champions.name: Sett
champions.skill_desc:
Passive: At the start of combat, squat adjacent units in the same row. Permanently gain 2% Attack Damage for each 1000 Health squatted. (Gains are doubled in Hyper Roll)

Active: Slam the current target forward, Stunning them and dealing physical damage. Deal Secondary damage plus % of the target's maximum health as physical damage to enemies within 2.5 hexes.

Fated Bonus: Gain 15% Omnivamp.

champions.name: Syndra
champions.skill_desc:
Passive: Start combat with (6 / 6 / 10) butterflies and gain one every 1 cast.

Active: Throw all butterflies at the current target, dealing magic damage for each butterfly.

Fated Bonus: Deal 10% more damage.

champions.name: Thresh
champions.skill_desc:
Grant Shield to Thresh and the lowest Health ally for 4 seconds and deal magic damage to enemies adjacent to both. Thresh shares % of his Armor and Magic Resist with the shielded ally for 6 seconds.

Fated Bonus: Gain 18 Armor and Magic Resist.

champions.name: Yasuo
champions.skill_desc:
Passive: Attacks while Shielded deal bonus magic damage.

Active: Gain Shield for 5 seconds and deal magic damage to the current target.

Fated Bonus: Gain 250 Shield at the start of combat.

trait.name: Star Guardian
trait.desc:
Star Guardians have a unique Teamwork bonus that is granted to all Star Guardians. Every Star Guardian fielded increases the bonus!

Prismatic: Spend 20000 mana.
THE STARS AWAKEN.

Rell: Gain shields.
Syndra: Gain Ability Power
Xayah: Magic damage on attack
Ahri: On cast, gain Mana
Neeko: Increase heals & shields
Poppy: Heal at low Health
Jinx: Gain Attack Speed
Seraphine: Gain every stat
Emblem: Increase other bonuses

champions.name: Ahri
champions.skill_desc:
Deal magic damage to the current target, increased up to 50% based on the target's missing health.

If the target dies, deal 55% of overkill damage split between the 2 closest enemies, plus magic damage per target.

champions.name: Jinx
champions.skill_desc:
Passive: Attacks grant stacking Attack Speed, up to 60%. Critical strikes instead grant 9% .

Active: Deal physical damage to the target and physical damage split across a 2-hex radius centered on the target.

champions.name: Neeko
champions.skill_desc: Gain 35% Durability and heal over 2 seconds, then deal magic damage to enemies in a 2-hex radius.

champions.name: Poppy
champions.skill_desc: Gain Shield for 4 seconds. When it breaks, deal physical damage to the target and physical damage to other enemies in a 1-hex radius centered on the target. The target is Stunned for 0.5-2.5 seconds based on how long the shield held, and other enemies are briefly Stunned.

champions.name: Rell
champions.skill_desc: Deal magic damage in a short line through the target, then reduce damage taken for 4 seconds.

champions.name: Seraphine
champions.skill_desc:
Passive: Ultimate Friendship Bomb's damage scales on Power of Friendship, which is based on all of your team's bonus stats (AD & AP & Armor & MR & AS & Crit & CritMult & Health). Stats on Seraphine contribute more.

Active: Fire a friendship bomb towards the largest group of enemies within 4 hexes, dealing magic damage in a 2-hex radius.

champions.name: Syndra
champions.skill_desc: Deal magic damage to the target and reduces their Magic Resist by 10.

champions.name: Xayah
champions.skill_desc: Gain 80% attack speed for 3 attacks. These attacks deal bonus physical damage to the target and 2 nearby enemies.
